column1: Uchi////lets start with the service.  the front of house is literally the best thing about the restaurant.  the guest service is impeccable
column2: they really have not left any detail out from seating to valet to wait-staff
column3: this place is run like a 5 star restaurant.  it gets a little too loud in there (might be the layout) and i dont like how there really isnt any privacy for the guests (shortback booths
column5: but restrooms are sanitary and they use the good paper towels.
